name: Zombies iMake - Halloween
description:
iMagine Machine™ is a member of Moms with Apps, a collaborative group of family-friendly developers seeking to promote quality apps for kids and families.

The original Faces iMake has been downloaded over 1 million times and is the winner of multiple awards, including the Parent's Choice Gold award and the ON award from Commonsensemedia.org

Questions, feedback or ideas? Please email us at: support@imaginemachine.com
